channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: U.S. and Taiwan Wrap Up Week of Trade Talks in Taipei
item.description: The U.S. and Taiwan have held the second round of talks under a framework trade pact signed last year. Negotiations, which took place in Taipei, focused on agriculture, protecting

item.title: U.S. Intelligence Chief Warns China, Russia Increasing Cooperation
item.description: The top U.S. intelligence official says China and Russia's increased military cooperation now extends to Beijing's ambitions to take control of Taiwan.

item.title: Taiwan Looking To Allow Foreigners as Social Workers
item.description: The Taiwan government is looking to allow foreign nationals to become social workers, as the sector grapples with a personnel shortage.

item.title: Massive Garbage Pile Grows on Xiaoliuqiu Island
item.description: Five hundred metric tons of trash have built up on the island of Xiaoliuqiu off Taiwan's southwest coast, with no companies willing to clean it up.
